Question: Shenzhen Baolijie Technology co., ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Baolijie Technology Co., Ltd.

Electric Toothbrushes and Toothbrush Heads

- Offers a diverse range of electric toothbrushes, toothbrush heads, and water flossers
- Products are globally exported, with a focus on North America and Europe
- Provides OEM services and emphasizes commitment to quality
- Customizable options for product color, bristle material, packaging, and design
- Features self-owned invention patent for the motor, metal-free tufting tech for brush head, pressure sensor tech, and wireless charging
- Manufacturing capacity includes 13,000 sqm workshop with over 500 employees and 30,000,000 annual output
- Offers one-stop service from design to production, including material, logo, color, package, and patent development
- Strict quality control from raw materials to pre-shipment, with online and after-sales service
- Committed to innovation, health, environmental responsibility, and excellence in quality

Contact: sales@baoljie.com, nan.huang@baoljie.com, Tel: +86 15625520500
Summary_cn:
深圳宝立杰科技有限公司。

电动牙刷和牙刷头

- 提供多样化的电动牙刷、牙刷头和水牙线
- 产品出口全球，主要集中在北美和欧洲市场
- 提供OEM服务，注重质量承诺
- 可定制产品颜色、刷毛材质、包装和设计
- 拥有自有发明专利的电机、无金属束材技术的刷头、压力传感器技术和无线充电技术
- 生产能力包括13000平方米的车间，500多名员工和3000万的年产量
- 提供从设计到生产的一站式服务，包括材料、标志、颜色、包装和专利开发
- 从原材料到发货的严格质量控制，提供在线和售后服务
- 致力于创新、健康、环境责任和优质品质

联系方式：sales@baoljie.com, nan.huang@baoljie.com, 电话：+86 15625520500
